item.title: The Hidden Life of Tokens: Reducing Hallucination of Large Vision-Language Models via Visual Information Steering
item.description: VISTA steers LVLMs away from hallucinations by cleverly adjusting token rankings during inference, improving visual grounding and semantic coherence.

item.title: Improved Training Technique for Latent Consistency Models
item.description: Researchers significantly enhance latent consistency models’ performance by introducing Cauchy loss, mitigating outlier effects, and employing novel training strategies, thus bridging the gap with dif…
